price: 109 Voilà assurément les vrais perdants dans l’au-delà.
arabic: لَا جَرَمَ أَنَّهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: lā jarama annahum fī al-ākhirati humu al-khāsirūna
